  • Oct 16, 2018

    A great set of 35 mm photographs from my time as a DNR Park Ranger at Itasca State Park during the summer of 1995. Many memorable adventures including removing pesky cubs from garbage dumpsters, recovering a stolen boat, and a recovery effort after straight line winds slammed a large portion of the park…which I somehow slept through. My living quarters were located within Douglas Lodge so of course I needed to show respect to Wallace Douglas:)
